channel.title: How can i change the xp rate for killing?
channel.description: How can i change the xp rate so it's like 10k per hit?

item.title: How can i change the xp rate for killing?
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“Elven Dremor, post:3, topic:252528”]Well im using deltascape’s source and i wanna change my exp rate to 300 how would i do it i see this.

[QUOTE] if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(100hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;
specOn = false;
specAttack();

		[/QUOTE][/quote]

Use your brains?

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the xp rate for killing?

item.title: How can i change the xp rate for killing?
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

Well im using deltascape’s source and i wanna change my exp rate to 300 how would i do it i see this.

[QUOTE] if (UseBow || UseCrossBow || UseRing) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(300hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(100hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;
specOn = false;
specAttack();

		[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the xp rate for killing?

item.title: How can i change the xp rate for killing?
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

Open client.java and press Ctrl + F and type in the search bar double TotalExp
Then it should find something like this: if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) { stillgfx(398, absY, absX); } LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+10; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true; double TotalExp = 0; inCombat(); if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); actionTimer = 7; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType); }
You see the TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);'s? The number (in my server its 400) is how many xp u gain per hit number. Change them to what you want. If your gonna change to 10000, then it raises ur level to 35 in the first hit and to 70 or 69 in the second.

Scroll down and you find more TotalExp = (double)(400 * hitDiff);'s

Compile and run. Post if you get any errors.

You can make backup of your client.java before trying.

Read full topic
